thread.section_title: banggood 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 banggood 的点评意见 | www.banggood.com
thread.title: Vladimir Shevchenko
thread.title_full: banggood 的点评人 Vladimir Shevchenko

author: Vladimir Shevchenko
title: Vladimir Shevchenko
text:
Banggood is a very good store, with a large assortment of products and very high quality service.
I buy part of this shop and I'm very pleased with it.
Sending out the goods within 12 hours after payment.
Service very quickly helps to solve the difficulties.
If the parcel is lost - the store quickly resends the goods.
If there are problems with the goods received - the store offers a replacement or refund.
I am very happy and content and recommend Banggood.
